body_html:
@Spenhouet : You snippet suggest that it is failing to build the protocol buffer library (not TensorFlow code) when using a particular version of MSVC.

What I meant to convey in the previous comment is that this is not a configuration that we have the bandwidth to support or debug. Figuring this out would require some experience/expertise with bazel-on-windows-building-protobuf-using-MSVC. You're likely to get more help on this from StackOverflow where there is a larger community.

We try to keep the github issues focused on bugs (on supported platforms) or feature requests.

Hope that makes sense. Thanks!

body:
@Spenhouet :  You snippet suggest that it is failing to build the protocol buffer library (not TensorFlow code) when using a particular version of MSVC.

What I meant to convey in the previous comment is that this is not a configuration that we have the bandwidth to support or debug. Figuring this out would require some experience/expertise with bazel-on-windows-building-protobuf-using-MSVC. You're likely to get more help on this from StackOverflow where there is a larger community.

We try to keep the github issues focused on bugs (on supported platforms) or feature requests.

Hope that makes sense. Thanks!
